channel.title: Need help please someone rep++
channel.description: Can someone please tell me how to hide .java files when u put your client download out? I dont want it to show the gui.java because then they can look at my I.p adress. SO if someone can please help me thank you!

item.title: Need help please someone rep++
item.dc:creator: @pea2nuts pea2nuts
item.description:
@pea2nuts wrote:

if you dont want to do that delete the .javas and highlight all the .classes and right click properties and click hidden and then apply

Read full topic

item.title: Need help please someone rep++
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

1: You need 15+ rep to rep++.

2: Either delete the .java files and leave the .class files (but then someone with half a brain cell can just use a decompiler), so Jar it and make it into an installer.exe.

There are various tutorials around, so just go search one.

Read full topic
